info.name: Donde.Augmentor.API - Latest
info.description:
# Introduction
What does your API do?

# Overview
Things that the developers should know about

# Authentication
What is the preferred way of using the API?

# Error Codes
What errors and status codes can a user expect?

# Rate limit
Is there a limit to the number of requests an user can send?

item.name: AddAugmentObject - Static(Check basic required properties, should not have locations, media type should be correct)
AddAugmentObject - Static- AudioWithAvatar (audio and avatar both need to exists and also belong to organization)

body.raw:
{
	"image":{
        "id":"{{currentAugmentImageId}}",
        "name":"should not matter",
        "url":"should not matter",
        "thumbnailUrl": "should not matter",
        "fileId": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"
    },
	"title" : "UML Commencement",
	"description": "Commencement Speech by President Bruno",
	"organizationId":"{{currentOrganizationId}}",
	"type": "Static",
    "media":{
		"id": "{{currentAudioId}}",
		"type": "AvatarWithAudio",
        "name":"should not matter",
        "url":"should not matter",
        "fileId": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000",
        "extension": ".pdf"
	},
	"avatar":
	{
		"id": "4bc3a5c1-cb6d-402a-aeda-811f539def3c",
        "name":"should not matter",
        "url":"should not matter",
        "fileId": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000",
        "extension": ".pdf"
	}
}

item.name: AddAugmentObjectMediaVisitMetric - 404(deleted augmentObjectMedia and not existing MediaId(audio or videoId)

body.raw:
